quote: Anything can happen: anything. Or nothing. Who can say? The world, monstrous, is made that way, and in the end consumes us all. Who am I, administrated or no, to have the audacity to survive it?
quote_letters: ANYTHING CAN HAPPEN ANYTHING OR NOTHING WHO CAN SAY THE WORLD MONSTROUS IS MADE THAT WAY AND IN THE END CONSUMES US ALL WHO AM I ADMINISTRATED OR NO TO HAVE THE AUDACITY TO SURVIVE IT
